column4: folks, my laptop gets hanged once I open any mpeg file. How to get around this problem? Any Idea? My Machine goes dumb stuck and I have to restart
first, you can use ctrl+alt+backspace to kill your session so you don't have to reboot.
second, which player are you using?
try if a different player like VLC works
I tried with all nothing work
did you try VLC? I'm asking again because VLC uses different set of codecs. in case your codecs are corrupted, you'll know then
I ran Hardware Testing and while it tests for display, my box goes stuck
which display card do you have?
How do I get that info
go to terminal and typ sudo lshw
82G33/G31 Express Integrated Graphics Controller by Intel
then use the command 'metacity --replace' without quotes and run the video
that is if you're on gnome
that disables compiz. it happens at times that video doesn't work when compiz is active
just curious, diff between compiz and X
